title: Fikentscher-Theodor Morell(doctor that poisoned Hitler)(2007)
description:
For english-only speaking:
This booklet is in german language. English title would be: Prof. Dr. med. Theodor Morell - A silent man at the top of German Reich 1936-1945. Morell was the personal doctor of Adolf Hitler before and during the 2nd World war. Many have heard that Hitler was a severly sick man and addicted to various drugs. According to Henning Fikentscher's research it was noone else than Morell that was responsible for systematically addicting and slowly poisoning Hitler. But that was not nearly enough. Despite protests from various doctors he also made sure that an effective medication against lices was replaced with his useless replacement. As a consequence 70-80.000 German soldiers died from spot disease. It is ironic that the same "medicine" was also given to Soviet soldiers who perished in hundreds of thousands. As an infiltrated member of German secret society Thule, Morell (like Bormann) was secretly working for the Zionist Bolsheviks and was presumably of jewish origin. With Hitler practically disabled and going insane towards the end of war, Morell helped to steer the fate of 3rd Reich towards its final doom. 55 pages.
